# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites bids for the Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance (ITM) Services for Storage Tank Systems Management at 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: GA210051_80960
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 21, 2024, at 13:00
* **Publication Date**: January 9, 2024
* **Estimated Contract Value**: $2,064,610.00 (including PCA) for the base period and $1,375,120.00 (including PCA) per additional two-year period (total estimated value of $4,814,850.00)
* **Contract Period**: April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2027, with the option to extend for two additional two-year periods

### Services Required

The contractor will be responsible for providing all labour, materials, equipment, and supervision required for ITM services, including inspection, testing, and maintenance of petroleum storage tank systems. The work includes managing the inventory of storage tank systems at 5 CDSB Gagetown, including the Gagetown Garrison and remote sites.

### Security Requirements

The selected contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). Details concerning the security requirements are identified in Amendment No. 1 to the tender documents.

### Bidding and Documents

Bidders can access the tender documents and submit their bid on the MERX website at http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Yuriy Klitynskyy at (506) 471-3972 or Yuriy.Klitynskyy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.
